item.title: Equillium: Economy, Highscores, Stable, 474 Data, Quests, Achievements
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“PI_Developer, post:20, topic:538056”][quote author=RiiPiiNFtW link=topic=656880.msg4398943#msg4398943 date=1390021434]
Honestly, it looks the same as other servers. Sure, you have an interface or two that others might not have, but the same concept of the content is generally the same. Good luck though.
[/quote]
The concept? You must mean skilling, bossing, pvp’ing, trying to get cash up to get a desired item, etc. That is the concept of all RSPS. Here you can find incredible unique content and exceptional code that makes you fall for the game. You can also find an exceptional and dedicated owner, who does updates almost every day.[/quote]By concept, I mean that the subject of the content is the same as the subject of the content on every other server.

Read full topic

item.title: Equillium: Economy, Highscores, Stable, 474 Data, Quests, Achievements
item.dc:creator: @PI_Developer PI_Developer
item.description:
@PI_Developer wrote:

RiiPiiNFtW:

Honestly, it looks the same as other servers. Sure, you have an interface or two that others might not have, but the same concept of the content is generally the same. Good luck though.

The concept? You must mean skilling, bossing, pvp’ing, trying to get cash up to get a desired item, etc. That is the concept of all RSPS. Here you can find incredible unique content and exceptional code that makes you fall for the game. You can also find an exceptional and dedicated owner, who does updates almost every day.

Read full topic
item.source: Equillium: Economy, Highscores, Stable, 474 Data, Quests, Achievements

item.title: Equillium: Economy, Highscores, Stable, 474 Data, Quests, Achievements
item.dc:creator: @k3wl_0wnz_y0 k3wl 0wnz y0
item.description:
@k3wl_0wnz_y0 wrote:

[quote=“RiiPiiNFtW, post:17, topic:538056”]Honestly, it looks the same as other servers. Sure, you have an interface or two that others might not have, but the same concept of the content is generally the same. Good luck though.[/quote]Our goal is not really to have fancy things that would hit you right in the face with its originality such as flashy sprites, interfaces and custom NPC’s. We like to keep it clean, and add a few things here and there that make the server to what it is. We are slowly progressing and we already have a few features that most other servers don’t have such as achievements for everything you do (Skills, Minigames, PvP and even activity). We also have 4 fully custom quests for more excitment in your gameplay. I am sorry you feel that way, though, so the server maybe isn’t for you.

Read full topic
item.source: Equillium: Economy, Highscores, Stable, 474 Data, Quests, Achievements

item.title: Equillium: Economy, Highscores, Stable, 474 Data, Quests, Achievements
item.dc:creator: @PI_Developer PI_Developer
item.description:
@PI_Developer wrote:

Still loving my time on this game, over 5300 minutes played. I’m one of the best I bet you can’t beat me. Played this game for 4 months, including 2 weeks before an eco reset, but it was so great I stuck with it and have a total of 5(I think) weeks playing. You should come play.

Read full topic
